opinion.attorneys: Douglas Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.
opinion.opinion_text:
The following order has been entered on the motion filed by Andrew G. Schopler on the 2nd day of August 2004 by to Withdraw as Appointed Counsel:
Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004.Page 738
